title: Whispers of the Forest
description: A piece that captures the quiet, mystical energy of a forest floor, combining bark, dried moss, and acrylics.

title: Ocean's Breath
materials: Resin, sand, and pigments on wood panel
description: Inspired by the rugged coastline of Northern California, this piece evokes the movement and texture of the sea.

title: Earthen Veins
materials: Soil, clay, and roots on canvas
description: An exploration of the intricate patterns found beneath the earth's surface.

title: Sun-Bleached Memories
description: A tribute to the quiet passage of time, using elements weathered by sun and water.

title: Resilience
description: This piece speaks to the strength and beauty of nature's ability to endure and adapt.
